name: Snakes and Ladders V2
description:
The classic game of Snakes and Ladders, rebuilt for a new experience.

Includes four different game types:

  • CLASSIC game – the classic game of Snakes and Ladders. You roll a dice, your pip moves. If you land on a ladder, you go up. If you land on a snake, you go down. First pip from 1 to 100 wins.
  • REVERSE game – pips start from 100. First pip to 1 wins.
  • HEADSTART game – all pips start at a random location on the board. First 1 to 100 wins.
  • BLIND game – numbers, snakes and ladders are removed from view. First pip from 1 to 100 wins.

Changes in this version include:

  • Rebuilt of my previous version.
  • Improved interface.
  • Game Log - a handy log to keep a track of the game dice rolls, snakes and ladders landed on.
  • Sound tracks and sound effects.
